items.name: Audit
items.description: Code4rena audit and optional mitigations review

items.name: Unused Funds
items.description: Any unused funds will be sent back to the DAO.

items.name: Nouns Fork
items.description: A new minority protection mechanism allowing Nouners to exit into a fork of Nouns DAO.

items.name: Proposal Editing
items.description: Allowing proposers to update their proposal's transactions and text description during the new Updatable period.

items.name: Propose by Signature
items.description: Allowing Nouners and delegates to pool their voting power towards submitting a proposal by submitting their signature.

items.name: Objection-only Period
items.description: A conditional voting period that gets activated upon a last-minute proposal swing from defeated to successful.

items.name: Votes Snapshot After Voting Delay
items.description: Moving votes snapshot up to provide Nouners with reaction time per proposal.

description: Send 200K USDC to the Tech Grants Safe to fund the second audit of the upcoming DAO V3 upgrade proposal.

project.name: DAO V3 Upgrade
project.description: Upcoming upgrade proposal for the DAO

title: Fund a code4rena audit for DAO V3
